Ibtikar Assembly โ Home - Ibtikar Assembly IBTIKAR Assembly #A_Generation_That _Innovates About IBTIKAR ABOUT US ibtikar assembly is a volunteer team that brings together Arabic-speaking university students interested in innovation, technology, research and development. It seeks to empower them and enrich their technical expertise through activities and projects that touch the studentโs life, starting with university life, through development in the technical field and community skills, all the way to professional planning and project management. VISION " Leader community in building conscious
youth, innovative solutions, and with social
impact " MESSAGE โ Investing and coordinating efforts among students to develop their technical skills, stimulate their innovation and creativity, and enhance their effectiveness in serving and advancing society. โ Principles QUALITY CREATIVITY Collaboration INDEPENDENCE FAVOUR ฤฐBTฤฐKAR's Journey +10 10/2022 Beginning The idea started with simple steps with the aim of reaching a greater vision +100 05/2023 Reality Activities on the ground and the mission becoming more clear +150 06/2023 First Period We began to work in an organized manner, developed

2023 Reality Activities on the ground and the mission becoming more clear +150 06/2023 First Period We began to work in an organized manner, developed clearer plans, and formed an administrative council +250 08/2023 Integrated Team We held a large forum for members to introduce the group, and those who believed in the idea joined us, and we became bigger and stronger. +400 11/2023 TEKNOFEST Arabic We have been waiting for this for a long time. Innovation Experiences Technology @ibtikar.mines ibtikar Mines An organizational project that seeks to educate and guide Arab students in Turkey towards useful technical programs that they can benefit from, whether they are local or virtual programs.
